notes.text:
This update for sssd fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-3621: Fixed shell command injection in sssctl via the logs-fetch and cache-expire subcommands (bsc#1189492).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A flaw was found in SSSD, where the sssctl command was vulnerable to shell command injection via the logs-fetch and cache-expire subcommands. This flaw allows an attacker to trick the root user into running a specially crafted sssctl command, such as via sudo, to gain root access. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality, integrity, as well as system availability.
